de.rincewind.api.gui.windows

Interface WindowSizeable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventBased, Modifyable, Sizeable, Window, WindowColorable, WindowContainer, WindowEditor, WindowNameable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    WindowPointer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftWindowPointer, CraftWindowSizeable, TestWindow, WindowConfirm, WindowFileBrowser, Windows.WindowPointerExtendable, Windows.WindowSizeableExtendable

    public interface WindowSizeable
extends WindowColorable, Sizeable
    This window is a ChestInventory or something like this, depends on this size. The valid sizes are:
    • 3 x 3 (Dropper/Dispenser)
    • 5 x 1 (Hopper)
    • 9 x (i e {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6})
    To set elements in this window, this point P(0, 0) is in the upper right corner.
    Since:
    2.3.3
    Author:
    Rincewind34
    See Also:
    Windows.WindowSizeableExtendable
